text: Willem Drees (; July 5, 1886 â€“ May 14, 1988) was a Dutch politician of the Labour Party (PvdA) and its predecessor the SDAP. He served as Prime Minister of the Netherlands from August 7, 1948 until December 22, 1958. Before entering national politics Drees was a member of the municipal council and also an alderman of The Hague. During this time he was also a member of the Provincial States of South Holland. Drees was an active performer of Esperanto. ==Other websites== * Biography at Parlement.com Category:1886 births Category:1988 deaths Category:Agnostics Category:Deputy Prime Ministers of the Netherlands Category:Aldermen of the Netherlands Category:Dutch centenarians Category:Dutch civil servants Category:Dutch councillors Category:Dutch esotericists Category:Dutch former Christians Category:Dutch provincial politicians Category:Esperantists Category:Leaders of political parties in the Netherlands Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:Freemasons Category:Government ministers of the Netherlands Category:Labour Party (Netherlands) politicians Category:Politicians from Amsterdam Category:Prime ministers of the Netherlands Category:Writers from Amsterdam
title: Willem Drees
